data.title: Cramer's week ahead: McDonald's, Amazon, Chipotle, Caterpillar, Boeing and more earnings reports
data.text: "At this point in earnings season, you should simply try to stop, look and listen," CNBC's Jim Cramer says.

data.title: Amazon will let toymakers onto its 'curated' holiday guide for $2 million, report says
Why Amazon Will Beat Roku in Connected TV
data.text: The OTT movement has been challenging for advertisers, who just want a way of simplifying and quantifying use of the medium.

data.title: Amazon AWS Selected by Old Mutual, Expands Cloud Clientele
data.text: Old Mutual selects Amazon's (AMZN) AWS as the preferred cloud provider, which highlights the reliability of the company's cloud computing services.

data.title: Amazon Continues to Grow Search Ad Market Share
data.text: Consumers increasingly head straight to Amazon when looking to buy something instead of Googling it.

data.title: Amazon Stock Emerges as a Great Way To Play AI (Artificial Intelligence)
data.text: AMZN stock is benefiting from multiple megatrends. But perhaps the biggest is AI.

data.title: The outcry over deaths on Amazon's warehouse floor
data.text: Billy Foister died last month after a heart attack at work. The incident was just one in a series of recent accidents and fatalities
